[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@holochain/tryorama](./tryorama.md) &gt; [Scenario](./tryorama.scenario.md) &gt; [installAppsForPlayers](./tryorama.scenario.installappsforplayers.md)

## Scenario.installAppsForPlayers() method

Installs the provided apps for the provided players.

The number of players must be at least as high as the number of apps. \*\*The agent pub key of the app options will be overwritten by the player's agent pub key\*\*.

**Signature:**

```typescript
installAppsForPlayers(appsWithOptions: AppWithOptions[], players: Player[]): Promise<PlayerApp[]>;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[PlayerApp](./tryorama.playerapp.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

An array of player apps.
